title: China econ. growth post-80s due to foreign invest.

content.question: Which of the following is the most common explanation for Chinaâ€™s economic growth after the 1980s?

choices.label: China successfully attracted foreign direct investment.
China adopted a structural readjustment program sponsored by the IMF.
China has received extensive foreign aid.
China has experienced record highs in agricultural output.

content.answer: China successfully attracted foreign direct investment.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply in a course country.
